TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Queryable extends System.Object
public ref class Queryable abstract sealed

summary.span: Provides a set of ( in Visual Basic) methods for querying data structures that implement .

span.span: Provides a set of ( in Visual Basic) methods for querying data structures that implement .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的一組方法宣告查詢的資料來源實作類別提供的標準查詢運算子實作。The set of methods declared in the class provides an implementation of the standard query operators for querying data sources that implement . 標準查詢運算子會遵循的一般用途方法[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]模式，並讓您透過任何表示周遊、 篩選和投射作業。以.NET 為基礎的程式設計語言。The standard query operators are general purpose methods that follow the [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] pattern and enable you to express traversal, filter, and projection operations over data in any .NET-based programming language. 此類別中方法大多會定義為延伸的延伸模組方法型別。The majority of the methods in this class are defined as extension methods that extend the type. 這表示它們可以實作任何物件上呼叫和執行個體方法一樣。This means they can be called like an instance method on any object that implements . 這些方法來擴充不會執行任何直接查詢。These methods that extend do not perform any querying directly. 相反地，其功能是建置物件，即表示累計查詢的運算式樹狀架構。Instead, their functionality is to build an object, which is an expression tree that represents the cumulative query. 方法接著會將新的運算式樹狀架構傳遞給其中一個方法或方法的輸入。The methods then pass the new expression tree to either the method or the method of the input . 呼叫的方法取決於是否方法會傳回單一值，在此情況下呼叫時，或可列舉結果，在此情況下呼叫。The method that is called depends on whether the method returns a singleton value, in which case is called, or has enumerable results, in which case is called. 目標資料上執行實際的查詢藉由實作類別。The actual query execution on the target data is performed by a class that implements . 任何預期實作是執行運算式樹狀架構所建構的結果標準查詢運算子方法就相當於呼叫對應方法的結果類別，如果資料來源是。The expectation of any implementation is that the result of executing an expression tree that was constructed by a standard query operator method is equivalent to the result of calling the corresponding method in the class, if the data source were an . 除了運作的標準查詢運算子方法物件，這個類別也包含一個方法中， ，哪一個型別物件做為物件。In addition to the standard query operator methods that operate on objects, this class also contains a method, , which types objects as objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法有至少一個參數的型別的類型引數是其中一個型別。This method has at least one parameter of type whose type argument is one of the types. 針對這些參數，您可以傳遞 lambda 運算式中，將會編譯為。For these parameters, you can pass in a lambda expression and it will be compiled to an . 方法會產生，表示呼叫本身做為建構的泛型方法。The method generates a that represents calling itself as a constructed generic method. 它接著會傳遞要方法由屬性`source`參數。It then passes the to the method of the represented by the property of the `source` parameter. 因執行運算式樹狀架構表示呼叫的查詢行為之型別的實作而定`source`參數。The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter. 預期的行為是指定的函式， `func`，套用至每個來源序列和累積的值會傳回值。The expected behavior is that the specified function, `func`, is applied to each value in the source sequence and the accumulated value is returned. 中的第一個值`source`作為累積的值，對應中的第一個參數的初始值`func`。The first value in `source` is used as the seed value for the accumulated value, which corresponds to the first parameter in `func`. 若要簡化常見的彙總作業，一組標準查詢運算子，也包含兩個計數的方法：並，和四個數值彙總方法，也就是， ， ，和.To simplify common aggregation operations, the set of standard query operators also includes two counting methods, and , and four numeric aggregation methods, namely , , , and . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建置一個句子，從字串的陣列。The following code example demonstrates how to use to build a sentence from an array of strings. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法有至少一個參數的型別的類型引數是其中一個型別。This method has at least one parameter of type whose type argument is one of the types. 針對這些參數，您可以傳遞 lambda 運算式中，將會編譯為。For these parameters, you can pass in a lambda expression and it will be compiled to an . 方法會產生，表示呼叫本身做為建構的泛型方法。The method generates a that represents calling itself as a constructed generic method. 它接著會傳遞要方法由屬性`source`參數。It then passes the to the method of the represented by the property of the `source` parameter. 因執行運算式樹狀架構表示呼叫的查詢行為之型別的實作而定`source`參數。The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter. 預期的行為是，它會叫用`collectionSelector`的每個項目上`source`來投射成可列舉的格式。The expected behavior is that it invokes `collectionSelector` on each element of `source` to project it into an enumerable form. 然後函式由`resultSelector`各中繼序列中的每個項目上叫用。Then the function represented by `resultSelector` is invoked on each element in each intermediate sequence. 產生的值會串連成單一的一維序列。The resulting values are concatenated into a single, one-dimensional sequence. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用對陣列進行反覆執行的一對多投影。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform a one-to-many projection over an array. 此範例使用結果選取器函式，以保留對應到各中繼序列的最後一個呼叫的範圍中的來源元素`Select`。This example uses a result selector function to keep the source element that corresponds to each intermediate sequence in scope for the final call to `Select`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會產生，表示呼叫本身做為建構的泛型方法。The method generates a that represents calling itself as a constructed generic method. 它接著會傳遞要方法由屬性`source1`參數。It then passes the to the method of the represented by the property of the `source1` parameter. 方法會將合併的第一個序列的每個項目，與第二個序列中具有相同索引的項目。The method merges each element of the first sequence with an element that has the same index in the second sequence. 如果序列沒有相同數目的項目，方法，直到它到達結尾的其中一個，就會合併序列。If the sequences do not have the same number of elements, the method merges sequences until it reaches the end of one of them. 例如，如果一個序列具有三個項目，另一個有四個產生的序列必須只有三個項目。For example, if one sequence has three elements and the other one has four, the resulting sequence will have only three elements. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來合併兩個序列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to merge two sequences. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Queryable#200](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Queryable/CS/queryable.cs#200)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Queryable#200](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Queryable/VB/queryable.vb#200)]
